title: form
description: A versatile form component with multiple variants for various use cases like contact, appointment, feedback, inquiry, and newsletter.

import.description: This code shows how to import the Form component from the library.

examples.title: Contact Form
Appointment Form
Feedback Form
Inquiry Form
Newsletter Signup

propsTable.title: Form Props
propsTable.description: List of all props supported by the Form component.

rows.description: Specifies the type of form (e.g., 'contact', 'appointment', etc.).
Defines the fields included in the form.
Sets the default first name value.
Sets the default last name value.
Sets the default phone number for the form.
Sets a default date for the appointment form.
Provides a message field for the contact or inquiry form.
List of interests for the newsletter signup form.

eventsTable.title: Events
eventsTable.description: List of all events emitted by the Form component.

rows.type: Triggered when the form is submitted.
Triggered when the input values are changed.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Accessibility considerations for the Form component.

ariaRoles.description: The Form component is rendered with the 'form' role.
An aria-label can be added for accessibility if the form has no header.
